actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to preserve the public health, safety, and welfare by prohibiting the entrance into and operation within the United States of civil supersonic aircraft that do not meet appropriate noise standards.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit the entrance into or operation within the United States of any civil supersonic aircraft engaged in commercial service which generates a noise level in excess of the level in effect for new subsonic aircraft.

titles.title: A bill to preserve the public health, safety, and welfare by prohibiting the entrance into and operation within the United States of civil supersonic aircraft that do not meet appropriate noise standards.
